snippet: Miller, a former star shooting guard for U.C.L.A. and the Indiana Pacers, will be answering questions via Twitter about the 2013 men’s N.C.A.A. basketball tournament.
abstract: Miller, a former star shooting guard for U.C.L.A. and the Indiana Pacers, will be answering questions via Twitter about the 2013 men’s N.C.A.A. basketball tournament.

headline.main: Have a Question About the N.C.A.A. Tournament? Ask Reggie Miller
